question:
Which among the following matches of places with their source of energy are correct?
1. Ennore- Thermal Power Station
2. Rawat Bhata- Nuclear Power station
3. Kopili- Hydro Electric Project
4. Nagercoil- Wind power project
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Ennore (Tamil Nadu)- Thermal Power Station. Rawat Bhata (Rajasthan)- Nuclear Power station. Kopili (Assam)- Hydro Electric Project. Nagercoil (Tamil Nadu)- Wind power project
